description: Uploaded by https://gitlab.com/gitlab-com/runbooks/-/jobs/6615991518 at Fri Apr 12 20:11:31 UTC 2024

panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

seriesOverrides.alias: /6h Degradation SLO \(5% of monthly error budget\).*/
/1h Outage SLO \(2% of monthly error budget\).*/

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: glgo Service Apdex

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="glgo"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="glgo"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="glgo"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="glgo"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="glgo"})))),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_30m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="glgo"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="glgo"})))),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_6h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="glgo"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="glgo"})))),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: Error rates are a measure of unhandled service exceptions per second. Client errors are excluded when possible. Lower is better

panels.title: glgo Service Error Ratio

targets.expr:
sum (
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="glgo"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_5m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="glgo"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="glgo"})),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_1h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="glgo"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="glgo"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_30m{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="glgo"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="glgo"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on() (gitlab_service_errors:ratio_6h{env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="glgo"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="glgo"})),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: glgo Service RPS - Requests per Second

panels.description: Saturation is a measure of what ratio of a finite resource is currently being utilized. Lower is better.

panels.title: runway_ingress SLI Apdex

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_1h{component="runway_ingress",env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="glgo"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_5m{component="runway_ingress",env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="glgo"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="runway_ingress",monitor="global",type="glgo"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_1h{component="runway_ingress",env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="glgo"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="runway_ingress",monitor="global",type="glgo"})))),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_30m{component="runway_ingress",env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="glgo"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="runway_ingress",monitor="global",type="glgo"})))),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_6h{component="runway_ingress",env="$environment",environment="$environment",monitor="global",type="glgo"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="runway_ingress",monitor="global",type="glgo"})))),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: runway_ingress SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Application load balancer serving ingress HTTP requests for the Runway service.



### Observability Tools

* [Google Cloud Run Console](https://console.cloud.google.com/run/detail/us-east1/glgo/metrics?project=gitlab-runway-production)
* [Stackdriver Logs: Cloud Run Access Logs](https://console.cloud.google.com/logs/query;query=resource%2Elabels%2Eservice%5Fname%3D%22glgo%22%0Aresource%2Etype%3D%22cloud%5Frun%5Frevision%22;timeRange=PT30M?project=gitlab-runway-production)
* [Stackdriver Logs: Cloud Run Access 5xx Logs](https://console.cloud.google.com/logs/query;query=httpRequest%2Estatus%3E%3D500%0Aresource%2Elabels%2Eservice%5Fname%3D%22glgo%22%0Aresource%2Etype%3D%22cloud%5Frun%5Frevision%22;timeRange=PT30M?project=gitlab-runway-production)
panels.title: Details
Estimated p95 runway_ingress Latency - per revision_name
Apdex attribution for runway_ingress Latency - per revision_name
Estimated p95 runway_ingress Latency - per response_code
Apdex attribution for runway_ingress Latency - per response_code

panels.description:
Open file descriptor utilization per instance.

Saturation on file descriptor limits may indicate a resource-descriptor leak in the application.

As a temporary fix, you may want to consider restarting the affected process.
 Lower is better.
panels.title: open_fds component saturation: Open file descriptor utilization per instance

panels.description:
Container CPU utilization of the Runway service distributed across all container instances.

For scaling, refer to https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/configuring/services/cpu.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, type, shard, revision_name, region, location) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      histogram_quantile(0.9999, sum by(le, environment, type, shard, revision_name, region, location)
        (
          avg_over_time(
            stackdriver_cloud_run_revision_run_googleapis_com_container_cpu_utilizations_bucket{job="runway-exporter",env="$environment",environment="$environment",type="glgo"}[30m]
          )
        )
      )
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: runway_container_cpu_utilization component saturation: Runway Container CPU Utilization

panels.description:
Container instance utilization of the Runway service.

For scaling, refer to https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/configuring/max-instances.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, type, shard, revision_name, region, location) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      sum by (environment, type, shard, revision_name, region, location) (
        stackdriver_cloud_run_revision_run_googleapis_com_container_instance_count{job="runway-exporter",state="active",env="$environment",environment="$environment",type="glgo"}
      )
      /
      100
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: runway_container_instance_utilization component saturation: Runway Container Instance Utilization

panels.description:
Max number of concurrent requests being served by each container instance of the Runway service.

For scaling, refer to https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/configuring/concurrency.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, type, shard, revision_name, region, location) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      histogram_quantile(0.9999, sum by(le, environment, type, shard, revision_name, region, location)
        (
          rate(
            stackdriver_cloud_run_revision_run_googleapis_com_container_max_request_concurrencies_bucket{job="runway-exporter",state="active",env="$environment",environment="$environment",type="glgo"}[30m]
          )
        )
      ) / 100
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: runway_container_max_concurrent_requests component saturation: Runway Max Concurrent Requests

panels.description:
Container memory utilization of the Runway service distributed across all container instances.

For scaling, refer to https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/configuring/services/memory-limits.
 Lower is better.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  clamp_max(
    max by(environment, type, shard, revision_name, region) (
  clamp_min(
    clamp_max(
      histogram_quantile(0.9999, sum by(le, environment, type, shard, revision_name, region)
        (
          avg_over_time(
            stackdriver_cloud_run_revision_run_googleapis_com_container_memory_utilizations_bucket{job="runway-exporter",env="$environment",environment="$environment",type="glgo"}[30m]
          )
        )
      )
      ,
      1)
  ,
  0)
)

  ,1)
,0)

panels.title: runway_container_memory_utilization component saturation: Runway Container Memory Utilization
